title: Emerald and Polki Chandbali Jhumka - పచ్చ మరియు పోల్కి చాంద్బాలి జుంకా
materials: Natural Pearls. Features our signature Hyderabadi polish for a rich
features: This exquisite Chandbali Jhumka seamlessly blends traditional South Indian craftsmanship with a touch of modern elegance. The design features a Polki diamond tear-drop stud, cascading into multiple strands of vibrant emerald beads. The lower part of the jhumka is accentuated with Polki diamonds and dangles of lustrous natural pearls. The overall shape evokes the traditional 'Chandbali' or crescent moon design.
occasions: or any special occasion. Adds a touch of regal elegance to both traditional and contemporary outfits.
description: Timeless design, handcrafted with the finest materials, and exudes sophisticated charm. The use of Polki diamonds and emeralds makes this a highly valuable and sought-after piece. The pearls are natural, adding to the value and beauty. A testament to Hyderabad's rich jewelry heritage.
